entry.title: Akita Goes Digital: Japanese Society Uses Blockchain To Guard Dog Breeds
entry.summary:
The Akita Inu, a majestic breed hailing from Japan‚Äôs northern prefecture of Akita, has gained international acclaim in recent years. To combat rising concerns about pedigree forgery and lost documents, the Akita Inu Preservation Society is embracing the digital age. They‚Äôve partnered with a tech firm to develop a secure system using blockchain technology, the same system that underpins cryptocurrencies.
Akita Goes Global: Digital Pedigrees Meet International Demand
The Akita Inu Preservation Society has witnessed a surge in overseas membership, with numbers jumping from 300 in 2022 to nearly 500 in 2023. This international interest presents a challenge ‚Äì ensuring the secure and efficient delivery of pedigree certificates.
Traditionally issued on paper, these documents were prone to‚Ä¶

entry.title: DOJ Counters Tornado Cash Developer‚Äôs Motion To Dismiss ‚Äì Details
entry.summary:
The US Department of Justice has released a rebuttal to Tornado Cash developer Roman Storm‚Äôs motion to dismiss the criminal charges levied against him by the government. In a filing submitted on Friday, the DOJ rebuffed several arguments made by the defendant‚Äôs lawyers while nudging the court to ensure the case undergoes a proper trial.
DOJ Fires Back At Roman Storm
On August 23, the DOJ announced an indictment against Storm and fellow Tornado Cash co-founder Roman Semenwov for their role in the ‚Äúcreation, operation, and promotion‚Äù of the popular crypto mixer platform. The US prosecutors charged both parties with conspiracies to commit money laundering, breach the International Economic Emergency Powers Act (IEEPA), and operate an unlicensed money-transmitting business.¬†

entry.title: Bitcoin Bull Run: Past Its Prime, Or Poised For A Correction? Analyst Raises Eyebrows
entry.summary:
Famed trader Peter Brandt has thrown a wrench into the gears of Bitcoin‚Äôs celebratory parade. In a recent analysis titled ‚ÄúDoes history make a case that Bitcoin has topped?‚Äù, Brandt throws cold water on the idea of a limitless price surge, suggesting the cryptocurrency might be nearing the summit of its current bull run.
Bitcoin And The Exponential Dampener
Brandt‚Äôs analysis hinges on the concept of ‚Äúexponential decay.‚Äù He dissects Bitcoin‚Äôs history, identifying four distinct bull cycles, with the current one being the fifth. Here‚Äôs where things get interesting: Brandt observes a concerning trend ‚Äì each successive cycle has exhibited a diminishing level of exponential growth. In simpler terms, the price gains haven‚Äôt been as explosive as in previous cycles.
This ‚Äúexponential dam‚Ä¶
